name: mikroe.click.rotaryrgb
short_description: Rotary RGB Click is a compact add-on board for creating visual effects and precise position indications. This board features 16 individual RGB LEDs (WS2812B-2020) from Worldsemi and a high-quality rotary encoder (EC12D1564402) from ALPS. The WS2812B-2020 offers low driving voltage, high brightness, and excellent consistency, while the rotary encoder provides accurate 15-pulse incremental encoding with push-button functionality.
